## BlockSvg.setWarningText() method

Set this block's warning text.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setWarningText(text: string | null, opt_id?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string \| null | The text, or null to delete. |
|  opt\_id | string | <i>(Optional)</i> An optional ID for the warning text to be able to maintain multiple warnings. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
